name: @azure-tools/communication-ten-dlc
description: SDK for Azure Communication Services which facilitates ten dlc management.

scripts.audit: node ../../../common/scripts/rush-audit.js && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --package-lock-only 2>&1 && npm audit
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p . && dev-tool run bundle && api-extractor run --local
scripts.build:clean: rush update --recheck && rush rebuild && npm run build
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint:fix: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test --ext .ts,.javascript,.js --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.lint: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test --ext .ts,.javascript,.js
scripts.test: rimraf dist-test && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test && npm run integration-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser

author: Microsoft Corporation
